item.title: Setup Unifi Controller using Docker
item.description: Setup Unifi Controller using Docker 1. Install Docker I used the official guide to install Docker, following the method to install from their apt repository: https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/ubuntu/#install-using-the-repository To validate that it’s working, run: sudo docker run hello-world Optionally, you can add your user to the docker group. This will remove the need to preface docker commands with sudo: sudo usermod -aG docker $USER newgrp docker 2. Configure Docker Compose File Create a docker-compose.
